top_items.author: @ziwenxu_

summary.en-US: OpenClaw工业化、系统设计、生产环境
summary.zh-CN: OpenClaw工业化实践、系统架构设计、生产环境部署

top_items.relevance: OpenClaw工业化、系统设计、生产环境
top_items.suggested_angle: Systems over spectacle. When builders mature, toys become infrastructure.

js_take.en-US: Toys break. Factories scale. The 99% who quit never made the leap from demo to deployment—because demos are fun and systems are work. Industrial-grade means boring, reliable, and profitable.
js_take.zh-CN: 玩具会坏，工厂能扩。那99%放弃的人从未完成从演示到部署的跨越——因为演示有趣，系统才是工作。工业级意味着枯燥、可靠、盈利。

top_items.author: @karpathy

title.en-US: Mac mini for OpenClaw, privacy concerns

summary.zh-CN: OpenClaw隐私风险、vibe coding安全审计、代码透明度问题

top_items.suggested_angle: Trust as infrastructure. When code is vibe-built, audit becomes mandatory.

js_take.en-US: 400K lines of vibe code. That's not trust—it's faith. When your keys touch 40万 strangers' code, audit isn't paranoia; it's hygiene. The tools are amazing. The transparency isn't there yet.
js_take.zh-CN: 40万行vibe code。这不是信任——而是信仰。当你的密钥触碰陌生人的代码时，审计不是偏执，而是卫生。工具令人惊叹，但透明度尚未到位。

top_items.author: @rileybrown

title.en-US: OpenClaw accessing Blender, Cinema 4D, After Effects, Figma
title.zh-CN: 展示OpenClaw接入Blender、C4D、AE、Figma等创意工具后的强大能力。

summary.en-US: OpenClaw创意工具集成、Agent能力边界扩展
summary.zh-CN: 超高互动(634赞)展示OpenClaw在创意生产管道的实际应用，完美体现"表/里世界"框架——创意工具正从App退化为Agent可调用的能力。

top_items.relevance: OpenClaw创意工具集成、Agent能力边界扩展
top_items.suggested_angle: The surface world of creative software is becoming infrastructure for the inner world. When agents can orchestrate Blender, Cinema 4D, and Figma in a single workflow, the tool fades and intent takes over. This is the migration from GUI to agent-native computing.

js_take.en-US: This is the shift from GUI-native to agent-native. Creative tools becoming APIs that agents orchestrate. The interface fades when intent becomes the interface.
js_take.zh-CN: This is the shift from GUI-native to agent-native. Creative tools becoming APIs that agents orchestrate. The interface fades when intent becomes the interface.
